## Changelog Entry
<!--
A changelog entry is required for changes that affect the codebase.
If your changes don't require a changelog entry, you can skip this by adding [skip changelog] to your commit message.

1. Create a new file in the appropriate directory:
   - changelog.d/icann_reports/ - For changes to core functionality
   - changelog.d/shared/ - For shared/infrastructure changes

2. Name the file: {issue_number}.{type}.md
   Where type is one of:
   - feat: New features
   - change: Changes in existing functionality
   - deprecated: Soon-to-be removed features
   - removed: Removed features
   - fix: Bug fixes
   - security: Security fixes
   - chore: Maintenance tasks
   - deps: Dependency updates
   - docs: Documentation updates
   - other: Other changes

3. Add a brief description of your changes in the file
-->
